ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( FolioResume__c = "FN" || FolioResume__c = "FI" || FolioResume__c = "PT", ISPICKVAL( Quotation_Status__c , "Approved as Succesful"), Account_Origin_Address__r.Address__c = "" )
